mapper.select: select account from bims_person where deleted=0 and account =#{account}
select account from bims_person where deleted=0 and account =#{account}
select name from bims_person where name =#{name}

SELECT t.id, t.account, t.NAME, t.belong_role FROM bims_person t WHERE t.deleted=0 and t.belong_role LIKE "%"#{params.role}"%"
and t.account LIKE "%"#{params.account}"%"
